data.name: Tkium Exclusion Area
data.detailed_description:
Tkium Exclusion Area is a short horror escape game which takes place in an asylum.
It has been evacuated, and no one seems to know why...
You need to get out of this place, and quickly. Your sanity decreases slowly as you try to find an exit in this place that you may mistake for a nightmare.
Each corner hides a dark secret, and the story behind this place holds much more. Why were you here? What happened while you were asleep?..

This game is one-time play, which means there is only one storyline and restarting it will not change any of the objects.



The area is fully locked down due to unknown incidents.
Find ways to open each door, and escape as quickly as possible.
Be aware of your insanity: it can lead to your death. You need to get out of this place before the counter reaches 100%.
The timer shows how long you have been in here.

data.short_description: Tkium Exclusion Area is a short horror escape game which takes place in an asylum. You need to escape the area before the fear takes over you. Find levers, discover systems and solve problems. Will you find the exit in one piece?...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows [version 6.3.9600]
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3110M CPU @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: This configuration is the minimum required to RUN to game. Expect latency and low FPS amount.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19044.1387]
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750M CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: This configuration is one of the best to run correctly the game, with a normal FPS amount and to avoid latency.
